attributes.comment:
I am an adoptive mother to a 3 year old Chinse daughter and also am waiting on
my second adoption from China. I am a two time veteran therefore, of applying
and going through your expesive process to receive the proper paperwork for an
international adoption. I am writing to strongly request that you not increase the
cost for applying for I-171 H. Because the timeline in China is taking so long to
match parents with children, we are already facing paying this exorbinant fee a
second time for one adoption. We also paid more for fingerprinting for our second
aoption than for our first. It is not fair, just or right. We have no choice but to jump
thorugh your hoops but... Can you not do this simple job on the already 850 plus
dollars we pay for this simple process of background check?? We are already
financially discriminated againt as international adoptive parents as opposed to
biological parents.
PLEASE LISTEN to us and take our requests into account!!!!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kathryn M. Ruiter
